judges: Before Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decrees affirmed at cost of appellant.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:

March 22, 1966:

Before Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Robert W. McWhinney, for appellant.
John G. Buchanan, Jr. and William Y. Rodewald, with them Buchanan, Ingersoll, Rodewald, Kyle & Buerger, for appellees.
